leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学信息-分子表示与检索生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 表示库 + 向量检索 + index

unit.unit_name: 相似检索/向量检索/索引

queries: [WEB] large scale chemical database indexing github
[WEB] gpu accelerated chemical similarity search github

tools.name: KripoDB
tools.one_line_profile: Library for handling Kripo fragment, fingerprint, and similarity data files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to interact with Kripo data files, facilitating the management and retrieval of molecular fragments, fingerprints, and similarity matrices for cheminformatics applications.

tools.name: openchemlib-hyperspace
tools.one_line_profile: Substructure search engine for large combinatorial chemical spaces
tools.detailed_description: A Java library extending openchemlib to perform efficient substructure searches within massive combinatorial chemical spaces (hyperspaces), enabling virtual screening of billions of molecules.

tools.name: iupacGPT
tools.one_line_profile: IUPAC-based language model for molecular property prediction and generation
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale pre-trained model that utilizes IUPAC nomenclature for molecular representation, capable of performing property prediction and molecular generation tasks.

tools.name: SureChEMBL-MCP-Server
tools.one_line_profile: Model Context Protocol server for querying SureChEMBL patent data
tools.detailed_description: A server implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) that provides programmatic access to the SureChEMBL chemical patent database, facilitating chemical data retrieval from patent literature.

tools.name: rDock
tools.one_line_profile: Fast open-source docking program for high-throughput virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A versatile molecular docking software designed for High Throughput Virtual Screening (HTVS) and binding mode prediction, supporting docking of small molecules against proteins and nucleic acids.

tools.name: VortexDock
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed molecular docking system for parallel virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based distributed system that parallelizes molecular docking computations across multiple nodes to accelerate virtual screening workflows.

tools.name: BIND
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-language models for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging protein language models to enhance virtual screening processes, predicting interactions between proteins and ligands.

tools.name: Vina-GPU-2.1
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated docking toolkit based on AutoDock Vina
tools.detailed_description: An improved version of Vina-GPU that provides faster and more accurate molecular docking for virtual screening by leveraging GPU acceleration.

tools.name: DockM8
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus docking workflow for structure-based virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: An integrated workflow for structure-based virtual screening that implements consensus docking strategies to improve hit enrichment and reliability.

tools.name: GNEprop
tools.one_line_profile: GNN model for predicting antibacterial activity
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) based model designed to predict antibacterial properties of small molecules, specifically for use in virtual screening campaigns.

tools.name: LillyMol
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive C++ cheminformatics toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance cheminformatics library and toolkit (formerly from Eli Lilly) providing robust tools for substructure search, molecular manipulation, and chemical data processing.

tools.name: DeepVS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning approach for docking-based virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool that integrates deep learning with molecular docking to enhance the performance and accuracy of virtual screening pipelines.

tools.name: MaSIF
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for molecular surface interaction fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework that analyzes molecular surfaces to predict protein-protein interactions and generate surface fingerprints.

tools.name: Automated QSAR Framework
tools.one_line_profile: KNIME-based framework for automated QSAR modeling
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow built on KNIME for curating chemogenomics data and developing Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) models for virtual screening.

tools.name: chempp
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance concurrent chemical search engine
tools.detailed_description: A C++ based chemical search engine leveraging RDKit cartridges and Postgres to perform large-scale concurrent chemical structure searches.

tools.name: QCSchema
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized schema for quantum chemistry data
tools.detailed_description: A library defining a standardized JSON schema for exchanging and storing quantum chemistry data, facilitating interoperability between QC software codes.

tools.name: tanimoto_similarities
tools.one_line_profile: Script for molecular fingerprinting and Tanimoto similarity calculation
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to generate molecular fingerprints and calculate Tanimoto similarity coefficients between compounds, useful for basic similarity searching.

tools.name: BioNeMo Generative Virtual Screening
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI blueprint for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A reference workflow (blueprint) using NVIDIA BioNeMo for generative AI-driven virtual screening, enabling the generation and filtering of novel molecules.

tools.name: NVIDIA Cheminformatics
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated cheminformatics tools and examples
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and notebooks demonstrating GPU-accelerated cheminformatics workflows (using RAPIDS/CuPy) for searching, screening, and clustering large chemical databases.

tools.name: RetMol
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval-based framework for controllable molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A framework that combines retrieval mechanisms with generative models to create molecules with specific desired properties by retrieving and modifying reference fragments.

tools.name: f-RAG
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment Retrieval Augmentation for molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a retrieval-augmented generation approach that uses chemical fragments to guide the generation of valid and optimized molecules.

tools.name: AutoDock-SS
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand-based virtual screening workflow using AutoDock
tools.detailed_description: A workflow that adapts the structure-based AutoDock engine for ligand-based virtual screening tasks, likely via similarity or shape matching protocols.

tools.name: SmartCADD
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated platform for virtual screening and drug design
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform combining Deep Learning, Computer-Aided Drug Design (CADD), and Quantum Mechanics (QM) methods for comprehensive virtual screening and drug discovery.

tools.name: PharmacoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-guided pharmacophore modeling for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that automatically generates pharmacophore models to guide ultra-large-scale virtual screening campaigns.

tools.name: HASTEN
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning Boosted Docking for accelerated screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses machine learning to accelerate structure-based virtual screening by predicting docking scores or filtering compounds before expensive docking calculations.

tools.name: ACPC
tools.one_line_profile: Chemoinformatics tool for ligand-based virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A software tool written in OCaml for performing ligand-based virtual screening, likely utilizing chemical similarity or pharmacophore features.

tools.name: miniBUDE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for molecular docking engines
tools.detailed_description: A mini-application benchmark derived from the BUDE (Bristol University Docking Engine) molecular docking software, used to evaluate and optimize performance across different computing architectures.

tools.name: VFVS
tools.one_line_profile: VirtualFlow for Virtual Screening workflow manager
tools.detailed_description: A workflow platform designed to manage and execute massive-scale virtual screening campaigns on computer clusters and cloud environments.

tools.name: CADD-Scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for virtual screening and protein modeling
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility scripts for automating tasks in virtual screening, cross-docking, and protein relaxation using Schrödinger and Rosetta software suites.

tools.name: GeminiMol
tools.one_line_profile: Conformational space-aware molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A molecular representation learning tool that incorporates conformational space profiles, applicable to drug discovery tasks like virtual screening and target identification.

tools.name: IRDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Interaction-based Retrieval-augmented Diffusion Models
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion model for protein-specific 3D molecule generation that uses interaction-based retrieval to guide the generative process.

tools.name: chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural Networks for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A widely used library for training Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction, often used to guide virtual screening and optimization.

tools.name: LIGSIFT
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for ligand structural alignment and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool designed for aligning ligand structures and performing virtual screening based on structural similarity.

tools.name: ChemRuby
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics framework for Ruby
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby framework for cheminformatics that provides functionality for chemical data retrieval, substructure searching, and property calculation.

tools.name: VFLib
tools.one_line_profile: VF2 algorithm implementation for chemical substructure search
tools.detailed_description: A Java library implementing the VF2 graph isomorphism algorithm, compatible with the Chemistry Development Kit (CDK) for substructure and Maximum Common Substructure (MCS) searching.

tools.name: metascreener
tools.one_line_profile: Integration script collection for molecular docking and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts that integrates various docking, virtual screening, similarity search, and molecular modeling programs into a unified workflow.

tools.name: DrugCLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive protein-molecule representation learning model for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DrugCLIP, a contrastive learning framework for protein-molecule representation to enhance virtual screening performance.

tools.name: DEEPScreen
tools.one_line_profile: Deep convolutional neural network tool for image-based virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A virtual screening tool that utilizes deep convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to predict drug-target interactions using compound images.

tools.name: rnamigos2
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based virtual screening tool specifically for RNA targets
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for rapid structure-based virtual screening targeting RNA molecules, facilitating drug discovery for RNA targets.

tools.name: ChatDrug
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based framework for systematic drug editing and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to facilitate drug editing, optimization, and design through conversational interfaces and prompt engineering.

tools.name: MoleculeSTM
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal molecule structure-text model for retrieval and editing
tools.detailed_description: A multi-modal foundation model connecting molecular structures and text descriptions, enabling text-based molecule retrieval and editing tasks.

tools.name: FPSim2
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance molecular similarity search library
tools.detailed_description: A simple yet fast Python package for running molecular similarity searches on large datasets, supporting various fingerprint types.

tools.name: pharmd
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacophore modeling and virtual screening from MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for deriving pharmacophore models from molecular dynamics (MD) simulations and performing virtual screening based on dynamic protein states.

tools.name: molpal
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for accelerated virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Pool Active Learning (molpal) is a software for accelerating high-throughput virtual screening using active learning to explore chemical space efficiently.

tools.name: pyscreener
tools.one_line_profile: Pythonic interface for various virtual screening software
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a unified interface to control and automate various virtual screening and docking software tools.

tools.name: PyRMD
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered virtual screening and molecular design tool
tools.detailed_description: A software package for performing AI-driven virtual screening and regulation of molecular design, integrating machine learning with cheminformatics.

tools.name: DENOPTIM
tools.one_line_profile: Software for de novo design and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A standalone software package dedicated to de novo design of functional molecules and virtual screening using evolutionary algorithms.

tools.name: pharmit
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive online virtual screening and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform for interactive virtual screening of large compound databases using pharmacophores and molecular shape.

tools.name: gypsum_dl
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating 3D small-molecule models for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A program that converts 1D/2D molecular representations (SMILES/SDF) into high-quality 3D models with proper protonation and tautomer states for virtual screening.

tools.name: SubPEx
tools.one_line_profile: Sub-pocket explorer for ensemble virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses weighted ensemble path sampling and MD simulations to explore protein binding sub-pockets, enhancing ensemble-based virtual screening.

tools.name: Indigo
tools.one_line_profile: Universal cheminformatics toolkit and library
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive cheminformatics toolkit providing libraries for molecule manipulation, reaction processing, and chemical search (including the Bingo cartridge).

tools.name: Indigo ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Open source chemistry electronic lab notebook
tools.detailed_description: An Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) system designed for chemists to record, manage, and search chemical experiments and data.

tools.name: Ketcher
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based molecular structure sketcher
tools.detailed_description: A web-based chemical structure editor allowing users to draw molecules and reactions, serving as a frontend for cheminformatics applications.

tools.name: Ringtail
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and storage package for AutoDock virtual screenings
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate the storage, management, and analysis of large-scale virtual screening results generated by AutoDock-GPU and Vina.

tools.name: Computer_aided_drug_discovery_kit
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for similarity-based and structure-based virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A collection of modules and notebooks forming a pipeline for pharmaceutical compound virtual screening using ligand-based and structure-based techniques.

tools.name: OpenVS
tools.one_line_profile: AI-accelerated virtual screening platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform and code collection for performing artificial intelligence accelerated virtual screening for drug discovery.

tools.name: Bingo (Indigo Cartridge)
tools.one_line_profile: RDBMS data cartridge for fast chemical structure search
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance chemical search engine cartridge (Bingo) for Oracle, MS SQL Server, and PostgreSQL, enabling fast substructure and similarity searching within databases. (Part of the Indigo toolkit).

tools.name: scaffold_hopping_whales
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for scaffold hopping using WHALES descriptors
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for performing scaffold hopping and virtual screening utilizing WHALES molecular descriptors.

tools.name: POAP
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized pipeline for Open Babel and AutoDock
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline script that parallelizes ligand preparation (Open Babel) and molecular docking (AutoDock) for high-throughput screening.

tools.name: PointVS
tools.one_line_profile: SE(3)-equivariant point cloud networks for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SE(3)-equivariant neural networks designed to process molecular point clouds for virtual screening tasks.

tools.name: dockey
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated tool for molecular docking and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: An integrated tool designed for molecular docking and virtual screening tasks, facilitating the interaction analysis between small molecules and targets.

tools.name: docker-postgres-rdkit
tools.one_line_profile: PostgreSQL Docker image with RDKit cartridge for chemical data management
tools.detailed_description: A Docker image providing a PostgreSQL database extended with the RDKit cartridge, enabling chemical similarity searches and substructure queries directly within the database.

tools.name: mongodb-chemistry
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of chemical similarity searches in MongoDB
tools.detailed_description: A library/prototype exploring and implementing methods for performing chemical similarity searches within a MongoDB NoSQL database environment.

tools.name: V2DB
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual 2D Materials Database generation and prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: Code for generating and predicting novel 2D materials through virtual screening, facilitating the discovery of new material structures.

tools.name: sars-cov-inhibitors-chemai
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based virtual screening for SARS-CoV-2 inhibitors
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale ligand-based virtual screening tool using deep neural networks to identify potential SARS-CoV-2 inhibitors.

tools.name: apo2ph4
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for receptor-based pharmacophore model generation
tools.detailed_description: A versatile workflow designed to generate receptor-based pharmacophore models for use in virtual screening campaigns.

tools.name: PIGNet2
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for protein-ligand interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of PIGNet2, a deep learning-based model for predicting protein-ligand interactions, used for binding affinity scoring and virtual screening.

tools.name: Structure-Based_docking
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for molecular docking and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to perform structure-based docking and single virtual screening tasks.

tools.name: RF-Score-VS
tools.one_line_profile: Random forest based scoring function for Virtual Screening
tools.detailed_description: A protein-ligand scoring function based on Random Forest, specifically tuned for virtual screening applications.

tools.name: Boltzina
tools.one_line_profile: Docking-guided binding prediction for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool for efficient and accurate virtual screening that utilizes docking-guided binding prediction with Boltz-2.

tools.name: BigSMARTS
tools.one_line_profile: Query language and search tool for polymer substructures
tools.detailed_description: Implements the BigSMARTS query language for performing substructure searches specifically on polymer structures.

tools.name: vs-utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for virtual screening and cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility scripts and tools for virtual screening and cheminformatics tasks, developed by the Pande Group.

tools.name: clipzyme
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction-conditioned virtual screening of enzymes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing virtual screening of enzymes, conditioned on specific reactions.

tools.name: SimSite3D
tools.one_line_profile: 3D protein-ligand binding site similarity search tool
tools.detailed_description: Tools designed to search a database of 3D structures (PDB) for protein-ligand binding sites that have steric and chemical similarities to a query site.

tools.name: screenlamp
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for hypothesis-driven virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to facilitate hypothesis-driven virtual screening workflows.

tools.name: Chem-Faiss
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable chemical similarity search using Faiss
tools.detailed_description: Utilizes Faiss vector similarity search and chemical fingerprinting to build a scalable architecture for searching similar compounds/molecules.

tools.name: dockECR
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus docking and ranking protocol for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: An open consensus docking and ranking protocol designed for the virtual screening of small molecules.

tools.name: docker-postgres-rdkit
tools.one_line_profile: PostgreSQL Docker image with RDKit cartridge
tools.detailed_description: A Docker image extending PostgreSQL with the RDKit cartridge, maintained by a core RDKit developer, for chemical database management.

tools.name: gpusimilarity
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated fingerprint similarity searching
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA/Thrust implementation for high-performance chemical fingerprint similarity searching on GPUs.

tools.name: scikit-fingerprints
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible library for molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A library providing molecular fingerprint calculation and chemoinformatics functionality, compatible with the scikit-learn ecosystem.

tools.name: VSDS-VD
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for AI-powered docking methods in virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool and dataset for benchmarking AI-powered docking methods specifically from the perspective of virtual screening performance.

tools.name: BINGObjectness
tools.one_line_profile: BING Objectness proposal estimator
tools.detailed_description: Matlab wrapper for BING (Binarized Normed Gradients) objectness proposal estimator, used in computer vision for efficient object detection.

tools.name: parsemis
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel and Sequential Graph Mining Suite
tools.detailed_description: A suite for finding frequent and interesting substructures in graph databases, applicable to chemical graph mining.

tools.name: gatnn-vs
tools.one_line_profile: Neural representation learning for scaffold hopping in virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improved scaffold hopping in ligand-based virtual screening using neural representation learning techniques.

tools.name: pinky
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fingerprint library
tools.detailed_description: A library for calculating molecular fingerprints, developed by the University at Buffalo Center for Computational Research.

tools.name: D2
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance virtual screening tool using direct 2D grid mapping
tools.detailed_description: D2 is a software tool designed to accelerate virtual screening processes by approximately 50 times compared to traditional methods. It utilizes a direct 2D grid mapping approach to efficiently evaluate and rank molecular structures for drug discovery.

tools.name: MolSearch
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based molecule analysis and similarity search software
tools.detailed_description: MolSearch is an open-source software designed for molecular analysis and retrieval. It likely leverages vector database technologies to perform chemical similarity searches and provides a user interface for analyzing molecular structures.

tools.name: InteractionGraphNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep graph representation learning framework for protein-ligand interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: InteractionGraphNet (IGN) is a deep learning framework specifically designed for predicting protein-ligand interactions. It utilizes graph representation learning to achieve accurate results in structure-based virtual screening tasks.
